data.name: GunFu Fighter
data.detailed_description:
GunFu is a lost ancient skill.The master of GunFu can control the surrounding time and let it flow slowly.Using the bullet time effect, the geometric distribution position of the enemy is analyzed and prejudged, and the order of planned attacks gives the opponent a fatal blow.



The bullets are limited. You must use the interactive environment to kill the most threatening enemy, and this is the key to victory.



Additional challenge tasks:

1. Use only bullets to kill all enemies.
2. Kill all enemies by any means other than bullets.
3. Don't kill any enemy.

I hope to be able to reproduce the movie-like fight scene under the minimalist style of painting, thank you for playing my game.

data.short_description: The first person shooter game with bullet time twist! Using the bullet time effect, the geometric distribution position of the enemy is analyzed and prejudged, and the order of planned attacks gives the opponent a fatal blow.
data.supported_languages: English, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 / Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3450
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560(1024 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS 10.6+
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 650 GTX / AMD Radeon 7850 HD series card
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages: scenes of blood and disturbing imagery.
